sentences.sContent: She wiped her eyes with her apron.
sentences.sContent_eng: She wiped her eyes with her apron.
sentences.sCn: 她用她的围裙擦干了眼泪。

sentences.sContent: She had put her louis in the pocket of her new apron.
sentences.sContent_eng: She had put her louis in the pocket of her new apron.
sentences.sCn: 她已把她的那枚路易放在她新围裙的口袋里了。

phrases.pCn: 码头岸肩；自码头货棚至水边间的空间

remMethod.val: 在四月(April)穿上围裙(apron)去干活

trans.tranOther: a piece of clothing that covers the front part of your clothes and is tied around your waist, worn to keep your clothes clean, especially while cooking
